title: Frontend Visual Test - Message Alignment
description: Create manual test scenarios to verify message alignment in the inbox UI. Test USER messages align right with primary color and CUSTOMER messages align left with gray color across different browsers and screen sizes
dod: Test USER messages display on right side with primary color
Test CUSTOMER messages display on left side with gray color
Test conversation with mixed senders displays correctly
Test alignment on desktop browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari)
Test responsive design on mobile viewport
Visual consistency verified across all test cases
